original_title: Ogu y Mampato en Rapa Nui
overview: Mampato, a little boy with a time-travelling belt, goes with his caveman friend Ogú to the ancient land of Rapa Nui on Easter Island. There they will meet a little girl name Marama and discover the old traditions of the natives.
title: Ogu y Mampato en Rapa Nui
